hero.subtitle: JEWELRY · DIAMOND · FINE GOLD · PEARL
hero.title: Timeless Elegance
hero.desc: Experience a curated selection of fine gold and exquisite diamonds in our Cheonan-si gallery. Where modern minimalism meets classic craftsmanship.

about.subtitle: THE ABEL EXPERIENCE
about.title: A Modern Sanctuary for Fine Gold.
about.desc: Our gallery in Chungcheongnam-do is designed with a minimalist aesthetic, allowing the natural brilliance of our gems and precious metals to take center stage. From our signature 'Abel Blue' diamond logo to our warm, inviting showroom.

gallery.subtitle: ATMOSPHERE
gallery.title: The Cheonan Gallery
gallery.desc: Step into a space where time slows down. Our showroom is designed to provide a private, serene environment for your most important selections.

contact.title: Let's find your
contact.private_desc: We offer private consultations for engagement and custom designs. Please call to schedule an appointment.
